response: "I just can't keep up with everyone's expectations of perfection. It's overwhelming."
"Why do I feel like I have to be flawless all the time? It's driving me insane!"
"I'm starting to question my worth because I can't live up to society's impossible standards."
"I feel like I'm losing touch with reality. What is even real anymore?"
"I'm constantly comparing myself to others, and it's making me doubt my own abilities."
"The pressure to be perfect is suffocating. I can't escape it no matter where I go."
"I don't even recognize myself anymore. I'm becoming someone I don't want to be."
"It feels like I'm living in a parallel universe where everyone is perfect except for me."
"I wish I could just break free from these expectations and embrace my true self."
"I'm drowning in this sea of societal pressure. I need to find my own path before I lose myself completely."
